1304505516861919234.text: Many reflect on where they were when the 9/11 attacks happened. I was at the Pentagon, meeting with then-Secretary of Defense Rumsfeld. When the planes hit the twin towers, we were forced to evacuate, and as I drove across a bridge from Virginia, the third plane hit the Pentagon.

1304505515515535361.text: 19 years ago, tragedy struck American soil, and our country was impacted forever. 1058451109008887809.text: While Congress has fought over some things, we've also worked in a bipartisan way to get the people's work done. It’s a record of results that’s making our country stronger and more prosperous, and I hope you’ll share it with your friends if they ask: “what has Congress done?”

1058451050582208514.text: CONSERVATIVE JUDGES: The Senate has confirmed President Trump’s judicial nominees at a historic pace: 84 total, including 29 circuit judges, 53 district court judges, and Brett Kavanaugh and Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court.

1058450992881172481.text: OBAMACARE RELIEF: Repealed the individual mandate tax that forced Americans to buy something many didn’t want or couldn’t afford, and ended IPAB.

1058450955019132929.text: BANKING REFORM: Provided Main Street borrowers and lenders relief from burdensome Dodd-Frank red tape for the first time.

1058450909812977664.text: ENERGY: Opened Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR), one of the largest untapped conventional oilfields in North America, to help keep energy affordable.

1058450853978365952.text: MILITARY FUNDING: After many years of neglecting our national security, our troop readiness, and the critical maintenance of our defense infrastructure, we’ve provided record funding to @DeptofDefense, including the largest pay increase in nine years.

1058450748571348993.text: TAX REFORM: Reformed America’s tax code for the first time in 31 years, putting more money in the pockets of American families and creating more opportunity for them and their children.

1058450700135555072.text: PREVENTING MASS SHOOTINGS: Enacted Fix NICS and STOP School Violence Act to help protect the American people from mass shootings and fix the broken background check system.

1058450649338298370.text: OPIOID LEGISLATION: Combating the nation’s worst public health crisis with a package of proposals to fight a widespread epidemic, including stopping fentanyl at the border and spurring development of new non-addictive painkillers.

1058450557046845450.text: FIGHTING SEX TRAFFICKING: Enacted the Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act to combat trafficking.

1058450500788649984.text: VICTIMS’ RIGHTS: Passed the Justice Served Act to provide funds to prosecute cold cases solved by DNA evidence and the SAFER Act to help reduce the rape kit backlog.

1058450440814247936.text: VETERANS’ BENEFITS REFORM: Delivered real reform and choice to American veterans with the VA MISSION Act. Provided the largest funding increase in history for veterans care and services, and to modernize the @DeptVetAffairs’s electronic health record system.

1058450177671946240.text: Since last January, we’ve passed historic tax reform, provided massive regulatory relief for businesses, and boosted our military with the biggest increase in funding in more than 15 years.  But our record of success is much lengthier than that. Here are some of the highlights:

943603065642504195.text: Congress has finally delivered on the promise of tax reform, and I am proud to have supported this historic tax bill.

943603019639328768.text: There has been a lot of mischaracterization of what this bill does, but the American people will know the truth when they start to see more money in their paychecks as early as February of next year.

943602951859425281.text: Businesses will be able to immediately write off the full cost of new equipment to improve operations and enhance the skills of their workers.

943602903817818114.text: This legislation delivers real relief to businesses by lowering the corporate tax rate to 21 percent, down from 35 percent. In fact, it reduces taxes on small businesses to the lowest they’ve been in 40 years.

943602852475392001.text: It also allows Texans to write off up to $10,000 of their property taxes.

943602801657118722.text: With this bill, the typical family of four earning the median family income of $73,000 will receive a tax cut of $2,059. The bill also expands the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000 for single filers and married couples to help parents with the cost of raising children.

943602744627204096.text: The bill nearly doubles the standard tax deduction and reduces loopholes, while preserving important tax breaks such as the teacher tax deduction for classroom expenses.

943602634262482944.text: In addition, this legislation not only protects current American jobs but also encourages companies who have moved overseas to come home and bring jobs back to Texas.

943602368318529536.text: Today, the House passed the most sweeping, pro-growth tax reform since President Reagan. These tax cuts will ensure Texans keep more of their hard earned money.

943169558155755520.text: The Tax Cuts & Jobs Act is a game-changer for every day American families. That is why we are determined to send to @POTUS’s desk by Christmas → https://t.co/xUKkMLewCY #2059more

943160750025166848.text: A hard working family of 4 earning a median income of $73,000 a year gets #2059more back in their pocket each year. https://t.co/xUKkMLewCY

943155574694404104.text:
See what’s new in the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act:
✔ Significantly increases the standard deduction to protect roughly double the amount of what you earn each year
✔ Expands the child tax credit to $2,000
✔ Lowers the corporate tax rate to 21%
https://t.co/xUKkMLewCY
